com.example.mobilibrary

Class SearchTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.mobilibrary.SearchTest

  • public class SearchTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Test class for ProfileActivity. All the UI tests are written here. Robotium test framework is used.

      • checkTitleSearchFound

        public void checkTitleSearchFound()
        Checks that you can find a book by searching for its title in the search bar.

      • checkTitleSearchFoundDetails

        public void checkTitleSearchFoundDetails()
        Checks that, once a book is found, the details that open when the book is clicked on matches what was found (i.e. the position isn't retrieved from the original list).

      • checkAuthorSearchFound

        public void checkAuthorSearchFound()
        Checks that a user can search for a book by author.
